subject: p19016834
Findings: AP radiograph of the chest was reviewed in comparison to CT and chest radiograph from. There is interval increase in pleural effusion on the right. There is also evidence of pneumoperitoneum. Given the recent surgery, attention to exclude the possibility of perforated esophagus is required.
